downloadDescription: Documentation to support Microsoft® Expression® Design with Service Pack 1.
detailsSection: This download provides documentation that has been updated for Microsoft Expression Design Service Pack 1.
installInstructionSection:
The updated User Guide file is not automatically installed when you install the service pack. To install the updated User Guide file, follow these steps:
  1. Download and then extract the Design.chm file from the .zip archive package.

  2. Copy the Design.chm file to the "en" folder in the Expression Design installation folder. By default, this is the following location:
    %ProgramFiles%\Microsoft Expression\Design 1.0\en
Note You may want to back up the original Design.chm file before you copy the updated file to the en folder.
